text:
The second trailer for the movie Bad Boys 3 is released with Will Smith and Martin Lawrence
05 Nov 2019, 15:15 by Daria Gromova
25 years later, Mike and Marcus are back in business.
Sony Pictures has published a new trailer for the movie Bad Boys 3 with Will Smith and Martin Lawrence in the lead roles. In the story, the paths of the heroes have long diverged: Burnett left the service and went to private detectives, and Lowry always swears with a new partner. But the Albanian mercenary, who decided to avenge the death of his brother, forces them to join forces again.



Judging by the trailer, the directors Adil El Arbi and Bilal Fall slightly reduced the level of action compared to the original diligence of Michael Bay (the emphasis here is more on the word ‚Äúa little‚Äù). But this is understandable - in the end, the heroes are no longer so young (and the actors too). At the same time, they decided to preserve the style of the first films - Mike and Marcus still make fun of each other and do wild things.
The world premiere will take place on January 17, 2020. In Russia, the film will be released a week later - January 23.
